title: LeetCode Assistant
description: Your personal programming coach powered by ChatGPT. Just share your solution and get instant feedback on what's going wrong.

inputs.title: Question
inputs.placeholder: Paste the question here

inputs.title: Your Code
inputs.placeholder: Paste your code here

inputs.title: Programming Language
inputs.placeholder: Enter language here

title: Mock Interview
description: Simulate an interview for any job position, providing personalized feedback and helping you prepare for your real interview.

inputs.title: Job Role
inputs.placeholder: Enter job role here

title: Code Explainer
description: Breaks down any piece of code and provides a clear explanation of its functionality, helping you understand programming concepts and improve your coding skills.

inputs.title: Programming Language
inputs.placeholder: Enter language here

inputs.title: Code
inputs.placeholder: Paste the code here

title: Code Error Debugger
description: Your personal assistant to quickly diagnose and solve coding errors step-by-step. Get instant help and fix bugs like a pro!

inputs.title: Programming Language
inputs.placeholder: Enter language here

inputs.title: Code
inputs.placeholder: Paste your code here

inputs.title: Error
inputs.placeholder: Paste the full error message here

inputs.title: What are you trying to do?
inputs.placeholder: Anything you can share about your objective or goal

title: Quiz Master
description: Practice your knowledge and understanding of any topic by dynamic AI-generated multiple choice questions with detailed explanations.

inputs.title: Topic
inputs.placeholder: Which topic do you want to revise?

inputs.title: Difficulty Level
inputs.placeholder: Enter Easy, Medium, or Hard

title: Personal Tutor
description: Generates on-demand tutorials on any topic. Use it for quick learning, exam prep or simply satisfying your curiosity.

inputs.title: Topic
inputs.placeholder: What do you want to learn about?

title: Cover Letter Generator
description: Supply your resume and some information about a job role you're applying for and generate a cover letter.

inputs.title: Job Role
inputs.placeholder: Data Analyst

inputs.title: Company
inputs.placeholder: IBM

inputs.title: Job Responsibilities
inputs.placeholder: Paste information from the roles & responsibilities section from the job description here

inputs.title: Your Resume
inputs.placeholder: Paste relevant information (e.g. education, work experience, projects) from your Resume here

title: Email Generator
description: Generate professional and personalized emails in seconds. Simply input your message and let AI do the rest.

inputs.title: Subject
inputs.placeholder: What is the email about?

inputs.title: Description
inputs.placeholder: Paste your draft, if you have one, just list some bullet points to generate the content of the email

title: YouTube Title Generator
description: Brainstorm creative and attention-grabbing titles for your YouTube videos, to generate more clicks and views.

inputs.title: Video Description
inputs.placeholder: Enter a description of the video here

inputs.title: Initial Title Ideas
inputs.placeholder: Enter some initial title ideas here

title: YouTube Shorts Script
description: Save time and increase the chances of your YouTube short going viral by leveraging the power of AI to create content that resonates with your audience.

inputs.title: Video Description
inputs.placeholder: Enter a description of the video here

title: Blog Writer
description: Just provide a topic and some notes and have the first draft of your blog post written for you

inputs.title: Topic
inputs.placeholder: Enter the title of your blog post

inputs.title: Notes
inputs.placeholder: Enter some notes about what the blog covers
